SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM NOTICE N INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON N.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO WHERE N.DEL_CHK = 0
AND N.NOTICE_GBN LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
AND N.NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'

SELECT N.NOTICE_NO, N.NOTICE_TITLE, M.NAME, NOTICE_CNTT, N.REG_DATE, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE FROM NOTICE N INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON N.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND NOTICE_NO = #{no}
